marshall_webapp

Astronomical-transient marshalling webapp for curating and managing streams of object observations generated by wide-field surveys

v3.0.9
Star

marshall_webapp package ∞

db(request)[source] ∞
main(global_config, **settings)[source] ∞

This function returns a Pyramid WSGI application.

admin_only_debugtoolbar(request)[source] ∞

Enable toolbar for administrators only. Returns True when it should be enabled.
